fulltext:
• A good learner from new things and good researcher for new technology.
• A devOps engineer can handle infrastructure setup, system and IT operations.
• A full stack developer that can handle front-end, back-end or database.
• Good view from UI/UX and can support professional designer make their product. Can basically
design UI/UX from self.
• Having a lot of passion for programming.
• Hobbies: guitar, football, traveling...
Quang Phuong Xuong

FPT Software
Project name:  Forensic Search Application (Korea).
Project technology: Kubenetes, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, ELK stack
(Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), C, C++
Project description: Develop an AI application which support for forensic
search, save, processing and manage metadata from camera and recording
devices.
Project size: 15
Responsibility:
• Working as Architect role.
• Working directly with customer to analyze requirement, consult and create
project proposal and estimation.
• Working with offshore team to review technical and solve technical issues.
• Create Software Specification, Software Design document, Architectural Design,
Information Architecture document.
• Implement the emulator for data ingestion library of camera.
• Onsite on customer side to discuss and delivery project with customer.
Achievements:
- Best team of the third quarter 2018
- Project has increase to double size in 2019
May 2018 -
Team Lead
Jul 2018
FPT Software
Project name: Genkimiru (Japan)
Project technology: Angular 5, PHP, Postgres, Magento2, Android, iOS (swift2)
Project description:  Develop a health system base on Web application (Portal,
Admin and E-commerce site), Mobile application (Android and iOS).
Web application portal is the web version of Genkimiru which support user to
track their healthy information, give the advice for user what good for their health
and they can also write post (the same with blog) to share with their friends on
social network.
